title: Global Finance Names Citi Best Internet Bank in Asia Pacific
summary: Hong Kong - Reaffirming Citi's position as the leading digital bank in the region, Global Finance magazine has named Citi Best Consumer Internet Bank and Best Corporate/ Institutional Internet Bank in Asia Pacific in its annual World's Best Internet Bank Awards.
tag-1: Global Finance Names Citi Best Internet Bank in Asia Pacific
tag-2: Hong Kong – Reaffirming Citi's position as the leading digital bank in the region, Global Finance magazine has named Citi Best Consumer Internet Bank and Best Corporate/ Institutional Internet Bank in Asia Pacific in its annual World's Best Internet Bank Awards.
tag-3: On the country level, Citi clinched the Best Consumer Internet Bank title in seven Asia Pacific markets – Australia, China, Guam, India, Indonesia, Philippines and Taiwan. In the Best Corporate/Institutional Internet Banks category, Citi took the lead in 12 markets across the region.
tag-4: Overall, Citi Asia Pacific collected 25 awards this year, including regional recognition for Best in Mobile Banking, Best Investment Management Services and Best Web Design and Best Integrated Consumer Bank site.
tag-5: "These wins underline Citi's position as a leader in digital banking and technology in the region. We continue to invest in our internet and mobile platforms to make banking simpler, faster and more secure for our consumer and corporate customers," said Citi Asia Pacific Chief Executive Stephen Bird.
tag-6: Now in its 13th year, Global Finance's World Best Internet Bank Awards represent a well-recognized industry accolade. Winners were first evaluated by a panel of independent judges before being selected by Global Finance's editors.
tag-7: With over 200 financial institutions vying for the top spot, winners were chosen based on a number of criteria including strength of strategy for attracting and servicing online customers, growth of online customer base, breadth of products offered and web-design as well as functionality.
